title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Nov 27 2021
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Nov 27 2021
description:
The aftermath of the Rittenhouse verdict: How did the left react? With slander, of course! Waukesha Christmas parade attack: Driver plows through Christmas parade, leaving at least five dead and 40 injured. The left plays narrative games in Waukesha. The media uses identity politics to divide America. Tulsi Gabbard: The jury got it right finding Rittenhouse not guilty, "Government was motivated by politics." Anthony Fauci suggests Americans will need boosters every six months: "We’ll do it." Clay notes, just another case where "Buck Sexton and I were proven right!" This will never end. This will become the pandemic of the "unboosted," says Buck. Australia is transferring positive covid cases and contacts to 'Quarantine Camps' by army truck!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
